SVGLengthList.summary: The SVGLengthList interface defines a list of objects. It is used for the and properties of .

remarks.para: An SVGLengthList object can be designated as read only, which means that attempts to modify the object will result in an exception being thrown.
An SVGLengthList object is indexable and can be accessed like an array.

SVGLengthListInitialize.summary: The initialize() method of the interface clears all existing items from the list and re-initializes the list to hold the single item specified by the parameter. If the inserted item is already in a list, it is removed from its previous list before it is inserted into this list. The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy. The return value is the item inserted into the list.
SVGLengthListInitialize.returns: The that was added to the list.

SVGLengthListGetItem.summary: The getItem() method of the interface returns the specified item from the list. The returned item is the item itself and not a copy. Any changes made to the item are immediately reflected in the list. The first item is indexed 0.
SVGLengthListGetItem.returns: The at the specified index in the list.

SVGLengthListClear.summary: The clear() method of the interface clears all existing items from the list, with the result being an empty list.

SVGLengthListLength.summary: The length property of the interface returns the number of items in the list. It is an alias of to make SVG lists more array-like.
SVGLengthListLength.value: A non-negative integer that represents the number of items in the list.

SVGLengthListAppendItem.summary: The appendItem() method of the interface inserts a new item at the end of the list. If the given item is already in a list, it is removed from its previous list before it is inserted into this list. The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy.
SVGLengthListAppendItem.returns: The that was added to the list.

SVGLengthListReplaceItem.summary: The replaceItem() method of the interface replaces an existing item in the list with a new item. If the new item is already in a list, it is removed from its previous list before it is inserted into this list. The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy. If the item is already in this list, note that the index of the item to replace is before the removal of the item.
SVGLengthListReplaceItem.returns: The that was added the list.

SVGLengthListInsertItemBefore.summary: The insertItemBefore() method of the interface inserts a new item into the list at the specified position. The first item is indexed 0. The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy.
SVGLengthListInsertItemBefore.returns: The that was added to the list.

SVGLengthListNumberOfItems.summary: The numberOfItems property of the interface returns the number of items in the list. is an alias of it.
SVGLengthListNumberOfItems.value: A non-negative integer that represents the number of items in the list.

SVGLengthListRemoveItem.summary: The removeItem() method of the interface removes an existing item at the given index from the list.
SVGLengthListRemoveItem.returns: The that was removed from the list.
